mapper.select: SELECT s205b.BSS_ASST_MNGM_NO , s002b.CD_VL_NM AS BSS_ASST_KND_CD_NM , s205b.PRDT_CD , s205b.BSS_ASST_KND_CD , s205b.BSC_ASTS_CNTS , s205b.RNM_CNFM_NO , s205b.BSS_ASST_ISU_CRNO , s205b.CRP_NM , s205b.INVST_CRRY_CD , s205b.CRRY_AMT , s205b.APLC_EXCH_R , s003b.CD_VL_NM AS INVST_CRRY_CD_NM , s205b.CREV_AMT , s205b.HND_DETL_DTM , s205b.HND_EMPNO , s205b.HND_TMNL_NO , s205b.HND_TR_ID , s205b.GUID FROM IBIMS205B s205b LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b ON s002b.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'B010' AND s205b.BSS_ASST_KND_CD = s002b.CD_VL_ID LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s003b ON s003b.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'I027' AND s205b.INVST_CRRY_CD = s003b.CD_VL_ID WHERE PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd}
SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(BSS_ASST_MNGM_NO), 0) + 1, 16, '0') AS BSS_ASST_MNGM_NO FROM IBIMS205B
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBIMS205B ( BSS_ASST_MNGM_NO , PRDT_CD , BSS_ASST_KND_CD , BSC_ASTS_CNTS , RNM_CNFM_NO , BSS_ASST_ISU_CRNO , CRP_NM , INVST_CRRY_CD , CRRY_AMT , APLC_EXCH_R , CREV_AMT , HND_DETL_DTM , HND_EMPNO , HND_TMNL_NO , HND_TR_ID , GUID ) VALUES ( ( SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(A.BSS_ASST_MNGM_NO), 0) + 1, 16, '0') FROM IBIMS205B A ) , #{prdtCd} , #{bssAsstKndCd} , #{bscAstsCnts} , #{rnmCnfmNo} , #{bssAsstIsuCrno} , #{crpNm} , #{invstCrryCd} , #{crryAmt} , #{aplcExchR} , #{crevAmt} , SYSDATE , #{hndEmpno} , #{hndTmnlNo} , #{hndTrId} , #{guid} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IBIMS205B WHERE 1=1 AND PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd}
DELETE FROM IBIMS205B WHERE 1=1 AND PRDT_CD = #{prdtCd} AND BSS_ASST_MNGM_NO = #{bssAsstMngmNo}
